rules.fullName: All-Canada Contact not from SF Marketing Cloud%28step1%29
rules.description: Moves the email address to Canada Hidden Email field when the contact is created for Canada region but did not get created from SF Marketing Cloud

rules.fullName: All-Canada Contact not from SF Marketing Cloud%28step2%29
rules.description: Replace normal email field with generic nomeailingcanada@pgi.com email

rules.fullName: All-Canada Contact not from SF Marketing Cloud%28step3%29
rules.description: Move email from Canada Hidden Email field back to normal Email field, as customer has been marked as opted in for email marketing
Notify sales user when a contact is updated and Opt Out = TRUE
rules.formula: AND( Inactive__c <> TRUE, NOT(ISNEW() = TRUE), ISCHANGED(HasOptedOutOfEmail), HasOptedOutOfEmail = TRUE )

rules.description: sets opt out date when opt out becomes TRUE

rules.fullName: PGi-Set Email Opt Out to True
rules.description: Sets Email Opt Out to True when contact is created for Canada (except if created by SF Marketing)

rules.fullName: PGi-Set Last Mod Date by Non-Admin

criteriaItems.value: PGi Admin Lite,System Administrator,System Administrator (No Expires)

rules.description: Sets the Last Modified Date by Non-Admin Functions

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 and 8
rules.description: Sends the initial survey to the customer and any follow-up reminders if the contact has not completed the survey.
If the customer contact does not complete the survey after 60 days, this workflow is triggered and resets the survey fields so that we can try again on the new Next Survey Date.
When contact is deleted, change RT Type
When the Contact Status changes from Not provisioned or Pending to any other status, the Nurture Status field is updated to 1 - New in order to remove the contact from the nurture track.
Contact pending, change rt type
Set status and send outbound message

rules.booleanFilter: 10 and 11 and ((1 and 2 and 3 and 8 and 9) or (1 and 2 and 5 and 6) or (1 and 4 and 8 and 9) or (1 and 5 and 7))
rules.description: Uses logic to determine what contacts to not sync with Marketo

rules.fullName: RT_Do not sync to marketo UNCHECK
rules.booleanFilter: 10 and 11 and (1 or (2 and 3 and 9) or (2 and 5 and 6) or (2 and 4 and 9) or (2 and 5 and 7) or 8)
rules.description: Uses logic to determine what contacts to sync with Marketo
Check the do not sync to marketo checkbox if the duplicate contact check box is set to True.

rules.fullName: RT_If contact deleted%2C automatically opt out of all emails
rules.description: When the status of a contact is set to Delete, the contact will automatically be opted out of all email communications.
